sentences.sCn: 一辆车在旁边停了下来。

sentences.sContent: Children’s prices are shown alongside adult prices.
sentences.sCn: 儿童票价标在成人票价旁边。

sentences.sContent: ...The findings of the study so against received wisdom that boys do better when taught alongside girls...

remMethod.val: along(沿着) ＋ side(边) → 沿着边

trans.tranOther: next to the side of something

trans.tranCn: 在…旁边， 沿着…的边； 和…在一起
